name: Gangstalker Maze
description:
This game was made for my school's final project for my Unity Game Design course. Simply because, I wanted to make this as dumb as possible.  Please enjoy.

There will be more to come. Mark my words.

Credits:

Gangstalker Proximity song: 

Note: Song is pitch shifted down. The Gangstalker is roughly 2 times larger than the player,  and I figured it would make more sense to make it deeper and more boomy. 

Various Goofy Sound effects: 

Gangstalker Caught you song: 

Please note: if anyone from Team Psykskallar finds this, and wants me to remove this song, please just contact me at my email, danielmorganjackson@gmail.com . I really loved this game, and I figured I would use this as a minor tribute.
